elements.name: p
elements.content: Our goal is to use our technology and platform to connect people. Your privacy is important to us. This privacy statement explains what personal data we collect from our members and guests, and how we use it to connect them and to continually improve the services we offer.

elements.name: p
elements.content: Kama-Bistro (“Kamabitro” “we,” “our,” and / or “us”) values the privacy of individuals who use our applications, websites, and related services .

elements.name: p
elements.content: We don't collect any information through app, registration is done through Web. We also collect location data ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION & ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, background location, device information, and usage patterns to improve our services.

elements.name: p
elements.content: We use collected information to connect drivers with members, personalize your experience, provide Driver support, and improve our services. We also use it for security, fraud prevention, and legal compliance.

elements.name: p
elements.content: We may share information between users to facilitate services, with third-party partners for service provision, and with authorities when required by law.

elements.name: p
elements.content: You can manage your email subscriptions, text messages, and push notifications. You can also control location sharing through your device settings.

elements.name: p
elements.content: We take reasonable precautions to protect your data, but cannot guarantee absolute security. We recommend taking steps to protect your account information.

elements.name: p
elements.content: We may update this policy from time to time. We'll notify you of significant changes through our platform or via email.

elements.name: p
elements.content: For questions or concerns about this policy, please contact our Driver Support.

elements.name: a
